skill.description: Implement UI using Shadcn MCP (atoms/theme) and 21st.dev MCP (complex sections). Use when adding buttons, layouts, or generating landing pages.

skill.author: AayushBaniya2006

security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or filesystem access. It provides instructions for using Shadcn and 21st.dev MCP tools.

content.user_title: Implement UI components and landing pages
content.value_statement: Building UI components manually takes significant time. This skill leverages Shadcn MCP and 21st.dev MCP to quickly generate buttons, dialogs, and complex landing page sections.
actual_capabilities: Generate foundational atoms (buttons, inputs, dialogs) using Shadcn MCP
Create complex landing page sections using 21st.dev Magic MCP
Apply themes and color palettes via Shadcn MCP
Build responsive page layouts with atoms and blocks
Follow mobile-first and dark-mode compatible design patterns
limitations: Requires Shadcn MCP and 21st.dev MCP tools to be configured
Only generates React/Next.js components using Tailwind CSS
Cannot create non-UI functionality or backend components

use_cases.title: Add UI Components
use_cases.description: Quickly add buttons, forms, and dialogs to your React project using Shadcn MCP

use_cases.title: Generate Landing Pages
use_cases.description: Create professional SaaS landing pages with hero sections using 21st.dev MCP

use_cases.title: Maintain Theme Consistency
use_cases.description: Apply and update themes across your app using CSS variables and Shadcn MCP

prompt_templates.title: Add Button Component
prompt_templates.scenario: Add a button to my project
prompt_templates.prompt: Add a button component using Shadcn MCP. I need a primary button with icon support and loading state.

prompt_templates.title: Create Hero Section
prompt_templates.scenario: Generate a hero for landing page
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a modern SaaS hero section with a dark gradient background, email capture form, and responsive design using 21st.dev MCP.

prompt_templates.title: Apply Theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Update the app theme to use a zinc neutral base with blue primary color using Shadcn MCP.

prompt_templates.title: Build Dashboard Layout
prompt_templates.scenario: Create dashboard with header and sidebar
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a dashboard layout with header, sidebar, and main content area. Use atoms from @/components/ui and place components in appropriate directories.

output_examples.input: Add a pricing card component with toggle for monthly and yearly billing.
output: Generated pricing card with monthly/yearly toggle switch
Integrated CSS variables for dark mode compatibility
Imported framer-motion for smooth toggle animations

best_practices: Use Shadcn MCP for foundational atoms before creating custom components
Place generated sections in src/components/sections/ directory
Always use semantic color variables (bg-background, text-primary) for dark mode support
anti_patterns: Manually coding components that exist in Shadcn or 21st.dev libraries
Using hardcoded colors instead of CSS variables
Creating page-specific components in shared ui/ directory instead of _components/

faq.question: Which tools does this skill support?
faq.answer: Shadcn MCP for atoms and 21st.dev MCP for complex sections. Both must be configured in your environment.

faq.question: What React frameworks work with this skill?
faq.answer: Next.js, React, and other React-based frameworks using Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui.

faq.question: Can I use custom CSS instead of Tailwind?
faq.answer: This skill is optimized for Tailwind CSS. Custom CSS requires manual intervention after component generation.

faq.question: Is my project data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only generates component code. It does not read, transmit, or store any project data externally.

faq.question: Components are not generating correctly
faq.answer: Ensure Shadcn MCP and 21st.dev MCP are properly configured. Check that your project has shadcn/ui initialized.

faq.question: How is this different from installing Shadcn manually?
faq.answer: This skill automates the component selection and generation process through AI prompts. Manual installation requires CLI commands and more steps.
